meta.name: Build a Support Ticket Analytics Dashboard with ScrapeGraphAI, Google Sheets & Slack Alerts

parameters.userPrompt: Extract all open support tickets from this support dashboard. Focus on ticket details, customer information, and current status. Use this schema for response: { "request_id": "unique_id", "status": "completed", "platform": "Support System", "tickets": [{ "ticket_id": "TICKET-12345", "customer_name": "John Smith", "customer_email": "john@company.com", "customer_tier": "Premium", "subject": "Login Issues", "description": "Full ticket description here", "category": "Technical", "priority": "High", "status": "Open", "created_date": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z", "last_updated": "2024-01-15T14:20:00Z", "assigned_agent": "Agent Name", "tags": ["login", "authentication"], "customer_satisfaction_score": null, "response_count": 3, "escalated": false, "sla_breach": false, "estimated_resolution_time": "2024-01-16T10:30:00Z" }] }

Extract recently closed support tickets for performance analysis. Focus on resolution metrics and customer feedback. Use this schema: { "request_id": "unique_id", "status": "completed", "platform": "Support System", "tickets": [{ "ticket_id": "TICKET-67890", "customer_name": "Jane Doe", "customer_email": "jane@company.com", "customer_tier": "Standard", "subject": "Billing Question", "description": "Full ticket description", "category": "Billing", "priority": "Medium", "status": "Closed", "created_date": "2024-01-14T09:00:00Z", "closed_date": "2024-01-15T11:30:00Z", "resolution_time_hours": 26.5, "assigned_agent": "Agent Name", "customer_satisfaction_score": 4.5, "resolution_summary": "Issue resolved by updating billing information", "tags": ["billing", "account"], "first_response_time_minutes": 15, "total_responses": 5, "escalated": false }] }

Extract knowledge base articles and FAQ data to identify common issues and self-service opportunities. Use this schema: { "request_id": "unique_id", "status": "completed", "platform": "Knowledge Base", "articles": [{ "article_id": "KB-001", "title": "How to Reset Password", "category": "Account Management", "views_count": 1250, "helpful_votes": 89, "not_helpful_votes": 12, "last_updated": "2024-01-10T00:00:00Z", "tags": ["password", "account"], "related_tickets_count": 45, "self_service_success_rate": 0.75 }] }

nodes.name: Advanced Support Analytics & Intelligence
nodes.notes:
Processes support tickets with
advanced analytics, SLA monitoring,
and escalation intelligence

parameters.content:
# Step 1: Support Monitoring Triggers üé´

Dual trigger system for comprehensive support ticket analytics:

## Automated Schedule Trigger
- **Frequency**: Every hour for real-time monitoring
- **Purpose**: Continuous SLA and escalation tracking
- **Coverage**: Ensures no tickets fall through cracks

## Webhook Trigger  
- **Purpose**: Real-time ticket notifications
- **Usage**: Integration with support systems
- **Endpoint**: `/support-ticket-webhook`

## Benefits
- Real-time escalation detection
- SLA breach prevention
- Performance monitoring
- Automated manager notifications

# Step 2: Multi-Source Support Data Extraction üîç

AI-powered scraping from multiple support system endpoints:

## Data Sources
- **Open Tickets**: Current active support requests
- **Closed Tickets**: Historical performance analysis
- **Knowledge Base**: Self-service effectiveness metrics

## AI-Powered Extraction
- Smart ticket parsing with ScrapeGraphAI
- Structured data extraction from dashboards
- Context-aware content analysis
- Multi-system integration support

## Extensible Design
- Easy integration with Zendesk, Freshdesk, ServiceNow
- Custom field extraction
- Multi-language support
- Real-time data synchronization

# Step 3: Advanced Support Analytics üß†

Sophisticated AI-powered ticket analysis and intelligence:

## AI Categorization
- **Smart Classification**: Technical, Billing, Account, etc.
- **Confidence Scoring**: Reliability percentage
- **Pattern Recognition**: Issue trend identification
- **Keyword Analysis**: Automated tagging

## SLA Management
- **Multi-tier SLA Rules**: Enterprise, Premium, Standard
- **Breach Detection**: Real-time monitoring
- **Performance Metrics**: Response and resolution times
- **Customer Tier Adjustments**: Priority multipliers

## Escalation Intelligence
- **Smart Scoring**: Multi-factor escalation algorithm
- **Risk Assessment**: Crisis potential evaluation
- **Automated Triggers**: Manager notification rules
- **Historical Analysis**: Pattern-based predictions

# Step 4: Smart Escalation & Reporting üìä

Intelligent notification system and performance dashboard:

## Escalation Management
- **Priority Filtering**: Critical, High, Medium escalations
- **Manager Alerts**: Immediate Slack notifications
- **SLA Breach Warnings**: Proactive intervention
- **Customer Tier Priorities**: VIP customer handling

## Google Sheets Dashboard
- **Live Analytics**: Real-time ticket tracking
- **Performance KPIs**: Resolution times, CSAT scores
- **Trend Analysis**: Historical pattern identification
- **Export Ready**: Management reporting

## Dual Reporting Channels
- **Escalation Channel**: Critical ticket alerts
- **Analytics Channel**: Performance summaries
- **Rich Formatting**: Actionable insights display
- **Automated Scheduling**: Regular report delivery
